item.title: CVE-2020-6099|2024-08-04T08:47:40.986Z -- graphisoft -- bimx%20desktop%20viewer
item.description: An exploitable code execution vulnerability exists in the file format parsing functionality of Graphisoft BIMx Desktop Viewer 2019.2.2328. A specially crafted file can cause a heap buffer overflow resulting in a code execution. An attacker can provide a malicious file to trigger this vulnerability.
